0.text: Innate - Prowl: While in  brush, Nidalee gains  10% bonus movement speed for 2 seconds, increased to 30% when facing a nearby  visible enemy  champion.

1.text: Innate - Hunt: Hitting nearby  monsters or enemy champions with  Javelin Toss or  Bushwhack marks them as Hunted,  revealing them for 4 seconds and granting Nidalee  10% bonus movement speed for the same duration, increased to 30% when facing a nearby Hunted target. Additionally, Nidalee's first use of  Takedown and  Pounce against Hunted targets are empowered.

2.text: The bonus movement speed from Prowl and Hunt can stack, but cannot exceed 30%.

0.text: Active: Nidalee hurls a javelin in a line in the target direction, dealing magic damage to the first enemy it hits, increased based on distance traveled.

Active: Nidalee lays a trap at the target location which becomes  stealthed after arming over 1.5 seconds, lasting for up to 120 seconds and granting  sight within its radius. The trap will spring upon contact with an enemy, dealing them magic damage per second over 4 seconds.

1.text: Traps have  6 maximum health and can only be damaged by champion basic attacks (2 hit points from  ranged and 3 hit points from  melee). Up to a maximum of 4 / 6 / 8 / 10 (based on level) traps may be active at once.

0.text: Active: Nidalee evokes the spirit of the cougar,  healing the target allied champion or herself, increased by 0% − 100% (based on target's missing health), and granting the target  bonus attack speed for 7 seconds.

Active: Nidalee's next basic attack within 10 seconds has an  uncancelable windup, gains  75 bonus range and is modified to deal magic damage, increased by an amount for every 1% of target's missing health. The minimum damage can also be applied against  turrets.

1.text: Hunt Bonus: Takedown deals  40% increased damage to Hunted targets.

2.text: Takedown  resets Nidalee's basic attack timer. Other damage converted to magic damage by Takedown are not increased by Takedown's respective effects.

0.text: Active: Nidalee  dashes a fixed distance in the target direction, dealing magic damage to nearby enemies upon arrival.

1.text: Hunt Bonus: Nidalee can perform Pounce from an increased range on a Hunted enemy closest to the cursor. Nidalee can Pounce to a target location near a Hunted enemy if she is close to the Hunted enemy.

2.text: Killing an enemy while in Cougar Form or using Pounce's Hunt bonus reduces Pounce's remaining  cooldown to a value. This has no effect if the remaining cooldown is already lower than that value.

3.text: Pounce will cast at max range if cast beyond that.

0.text: Active: Nidalee slashes her claws in an arc in the target direction, dealing magic damage to all enemies within the area.
Active: Nidalee transforms herself into a cougar, gaining  melee attacks with  125 range as well as new abilities.

1.text: Active: Nidalee transforms herself into a human, gaining  ranged attacks with 525  range as well as new abilities.

2.text: Triggering  Hunt resets Aspect of the Cougar's  cooldown if Nidalee is in human form.

3.text: Nidalee begins with one rank in Aspect of the Cougar and can increase it at levels 6, 11, and 16.
